section.title: Using SSH to Configure VMware ESXi Hosts to Enable Console Access
section.para: Configure the gdbserver ruleset on the host using SSH.

procedure.title: To Configure VMware ESXi Hosts to Enable Console Access (Using SSH)

step.screen: # esxcli network firewall ruleset set --ruleset-id gdbserver --enabled true

step.para: Confirm that the ruleset is active:
